definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The supplies of sugar have been running low,causing a rise in the price.
sentences.chinese: 糖的供應日漸短缺，從而引起價格的上漲。

sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 國家氣象臺曾預報紅河將上漲到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: The increase of gross price level is the sacrifice a country makes for exercizing its function.
sentences.chinese: 價格總水平的上漲是國家爲實現其職能所付出的代價。

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 隨着石油價格的上漲，人們更加願意使用電單車。

sentences.english: GTX shares are up 180% over the past year.
sentences.chinese: 在過去一年裏，GTX公司股票上漲了180%。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小於預期的失業數和失業率的神奇下跌使美股上漲。

sentences.english: Floodwaters are still rising after this week's heavy downpours across parts of Ohio .
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄州部分地區本週連降暴雨，洪水仍在不斷上漲。

sentences.english: The false performance record drove up the stocks of WorldCom and won it great acclaims from the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 虛假的業績使世通的股票上漲，股市一片讚譽。

sentences.english: Since then, HP's stock has jumped 22% to $28.
sentences.chinese: 此後，惠普的股價已升至28美元，上漲了22%。

sentences.english: A rise in prices nullifies a rise in wages.
sentences.chinese: 物價上漲抵銷了工資的增加。
歐洲迪斯尼的股票價格迅速上漲了17便士。

sentences.english: This is up to request the form, the results are not up.
sentences.chinese: 這就是形態上要求上漲，結果不漲。

sentences.english: Prices of staple foods have risen by up to 100 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 主糧的價格已經上漲了100%。

sentences.english: The price of thread steel has been increasing recently.
sentences.chinese: 近期螺紋鋼的價格持續上漲。

sentences.english: In the short-run, there are definitely some headwinds.
sentences.chinese: 短期而言，金價上漲無疑存在一些阻力。

sentences.english: Currently, flower source's wholesaling the sales price of habitat Guangzhou has been already risen.
sentences.chinese: 目前，花源批發產地廣州的售價已經上漲。

definition: extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
